pkgmetadata.longdescription: # polywrap-wasmPython implementation of the plugin wrapper runtime.## Usage### Invoke Plugin Wrapper```pythonfrom typing import Any, Dict, List, Union, Optionalfrom polywrap_manifest import AnyWrapManifestfrom polywrap_plugin import PluginModulefrom polywrap_core import Invoker, Uri, InvokerOptions, UriPackageOrWrapper, Envclass GreetingModule(PluginModule[None]): def __init__(self, config: None): super().__init__(config) def greeting(self, args: Dict[str, Any], client: Invoker[UriPackageOrWrapper], env: Optional[Env] = None): return f"Greetings from: {args['name']}"manifest = cast(AnyWrapManifest, {})wrapper = PluginWrapper(greeting_module, manifest)args = { "name": "Joe"}options: InvokeOptions[UriPackageOrWrapper] = InvokeOptions( uri=Uri.from_str("ens/greeting.eth"), method="greeting", args=args)invoker: Invoker = ...result = await wrapper.invoke(options, invoker)assert result, "Greetings from: Joe"```
